mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_review (matzip_id, member_id, content, regdate, star_rating) VALUES (#{review.matzip.id}, #{review.member.id}, #{review.content}, #{review.regdate}, #{review.starRating})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM my_matzip m INNER JOIN friend f ON (f.sender_id = #{member.id} AND f.receiver_id = m.member_id OR f.receiver_id = #{member.id} AND f.sender_id = m.member_id) WHERE f.is_accept = true AND m.visibility = 'HIDDEN' AND matzip_id = #{matzip.id}
